name: Liquid Bullet
description:
Liquid Bullet

You are an MI 6 agent working undercover in a bar in the seedy underbelly of London in the 1930’s. Serve up drinks to the various dubious characters that pass by your counter. Decide who to spare and who to poison with the Liquid Bullet!

How to Play

In Liquid Bullet you must make quick decisions on whether or not a character is your target. The characters will introduce themselves and ask for a drink. You will need to check the recipe page to see what goes into the drink they ask for. Once you know how to make the drink go back to the bar and select Drinks. This will take you to the ingredients, you will need to select the correct ingredients. Once you select hit Confirm this will take you to the page where you chose whether or not to poison the character. To Poison select the bottle if not just hit continue. You will continue making drinks until the end of day 3 where you will receive two scores, a Bartender Score and a Hitman Score. The max Bartender Score is 1500 and the max Hitman Score is 700.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button... that's it
